about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a front-end developer and I enjoy giving shape to ideas through the web. I work primarily with React and modern technologies, always striving for interfaces that are clear, fast, and easy to use. I pay close attention to design details and enjoy creating user-friendly and comfortable experiences.
about.description2: I've also worked with microfrontends configured with Webpack, which has allowed me to participate in large, modular projects. I enjoy collaborating with design and backend teams to ensure product consistency and bring ideas to production in the best possible way. I'm always learning new tools and best practices to improve the quality and performance of my code.

1.title: Kreator
1.description: Platform for creating educational content in both book format and interactive course format simultaneously, allowing the addition of interactive elements to add dynamism to the content, all in an editor that allows multiple users to edit simultaneously. It also has a user and role management component.

2.title: Luna
2.description: Platform for creating and managing Moodle campuses, allowing the creation and customization of campuses, user management, courses, and roles.
